ratings.question_text: The readings/cases/textbooks used in this course were __________ .
Out-of-class assignments for this course were ___________ to my learning.
The workload for this course in comparison to other courses was ___________.
The pace of this class was ____________ for optimal learning.
Field trips were well designed and ran smoothly.
I learned a lot from field trips.
How clearly does the instructor provide explanations of conceptual material?
How responsive to student comments was the instructor?
I would give the instructor of this class an overall rating of:
I would give this course an overall rating of:
Apart from how well the course was taught, how valuable is the course to students with interests similar to yours?
Did you participate in a work group as part of this course?

narratives.question_text: Use the space below to comment on questions 1-14, if you wish
comments: Professor Vance and his team did an exceptional job.
The courses improved foreign students' professional English writing, reading, speaking and thinking skills.
This course can be useful to everyone both native or non-native.
The lecturer is very nice and helpful. The lectures were clearly organized.

narratives.question_text: What were the best aspects of this course?
comments: The regular monitoring of our progress and the weekly break out sections on Monday.
The practicum session is a very chance for students to talk with professor face to face.
Presentation, negotiation and writing skills.
The content of the course is very valuable. I will continuously use it in my professional life.
Writing skills
Developing argument and presentations
Small groups are set for practing oral English
Individual focus and discussions on the many facets of communication. Makes you rethink the purpose and effectiveness ofmessage delivery in many ways.

narratives.question_text: What aspects of this course need the most improvement?
comments: A field trip or interractions with students who took the class before might motivate some students to pick up the communication skills faster.
Pronunciation and practice

It would be a good idea to provide students with a booklet that contains all the course presentations in it for us to have access to it in the future. Or to have an online booklet for us to keep. Paper pages can easily get lost and we could therefore miss out on reference material for the future.
More discussion
Just right
There should more lectures on oral English.
The course was very well rounded. I found nothing wanting. It would be great if the video content of the class sessions was newer!

narratives.question_text: Was the relationship between the course lectures and discussion/lab section
comments: Yes, the weekly sections ensured that we were practicing the skills
Writing and presentation coaching were fine.
The practicum sessions were helpful to increase the understanding of the class
NA
The course lectures and discussion is highly related.
Yes

narratives.question_text: Discuss, if you wish, how this course fits into your overall program.  (Please feel free to describe how the course relates to your academic background.)
comments: I am more confident about the public speaking and writing that is ahead of me.
This class is important for the improvement of the ability to communicate in the environmental world.
This course will help me in my day to day and professional communication
My nature of work requires many presentations and writings, this course offers all required tactics and skills.
It helps me to improve my communication skills.

narratives.question_text: Why did you take this course?
comments: To improve my communication skills
Because English is a foreign language for me.
It was a compulsion
I wanted to improve my communication skills. Also to gain confidence with communicating in english.
To improve both my written and spoken skills
It is mendatory.
The course is quite interactive. It helps you re evaluate overall aspects of your communication.

narratives.question_text: Did the knowledge/skills that you gained from the course meet your expectations ?
comments: Yes!
YES
Yes
All the expectations were not met. Semester flew away so quickly.
Yes
Yes, very well
Yes.
Yes

narratives.question_text: If yes, what were the advantages and disadvantages of the group work?
comments: Our weekly sections with a particular group of people and Professor Vance made became comfortable zones where we could make mistakes without fear of condemnation.
The group work was few short duration works during classes. No major group work as such.
Since the group works were within the class hours and well-organised, very effective and helpful.
It was helpful and interactive while working as small work groups
The group work helped understand how misinterpretations and misconstructions occur when interacting with a global audience and how accuracy and brevity of expression are important.

narratives.question_text: For students who might consider taking this course, what advice would you give them?
comments: The demands that the course places on students is worth the effort.
I highly recommend students to take the class for their career.
If you are not confident in your English communication skills go for it.

This course is good for you if you want to feel stronger with your english speaking capabilities. Also, if you come from another country and are unfamiliar with writing papers, references or public speaking, it is a good idea to take this course.
Exercise
This is a course to enhance your communication skills, i would recommend everyone to take this course
Spend more time to practice oral English.
I enjoyed the course. It was stress free and useful. Can even be taken as a fifth full credit course as the work load is lighter compared to other courses.
